Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-49767 affecting package python-werkzeug for versions less than 3.0.3-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-49767 affecting package python-werkzeug for versions less than 3.0.3-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package python-werkzeug is earlier than 3.0.3-2, affected by CVE-2024-49767
